house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1959 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) . Rooms include family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, patio, air conditioning, storage space.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Dining/Living Combo,Dishwasher, Pantry, Storage Space
